pages.privacy-policy: Gentleman - Privacy Policy: Your Data and Our Commitment for Premium Men's Suits Gentleman HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy At Gentleman, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our website. Information We Collect We may collect two types of information: **Personal Information:** This is information that can be used to identify you directly, such as your name, email address, and phone number (if provided). You only provide this information voluntarily, such as when signing up for a newsletter or contacting us. **Non-Personal Information:** This is information that cannot be used to identify you directly, such as your browser type, IP address, browsing activity on our website, and demographic data (if collected). This information may be collected automatically through cookies and other technologies. How We Use Your Information We may use your information for the following purposes: To provide you with the services and information you request. To improve the content and functionality of our website. To send you newsletters and other promotional materials (with your consent). To personalize your experience on our website. To analyze how users interact with our website. Cookies We use cookies to collect information about your use of our website. Cookies are small data files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. You can choose to disable cookies in your browser settings. However, this may limit your ability to use certain features of our website. Your Choices You have choices regarding your information: You can choose not to provide us with any personal information. You can unsubscribe from our newsletters or other promotional materials at any time. You can access and update your personal information by contacting us. The Gentleman website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Gentleman Elevate Your Style. Discover trendy Suits at Gentleman.
